name: Backpack Apocalypse
description:
This game was made in 72 hours for the ludum dare 40 jam where the theme was "The more you have the worse it gets".

So for my game I decided to make a top down zombie shooter where there are no backpacks. This means that every item that you pick up to help you survive makes you move slower and turn more sluggishly. The aim is to find the 4 car components in the level to escape the zombies.

Controls:
W,A,S,D - Move
E - Pick up item
Right Click - Punch/Shoot
